unique_effects.name: AgarusLegendaryAbility
unique_effects.description: Legendary Ability: Revive all Slayers in a large radius, granting them healing over time and immunity to stagger. Usable while downed.

unique_effects.name: BoreusFrostSprite
unique_effects.description: After Surging, generate 2 Frost Sprites that grant your next attack +30 damage and minor frost damage (Max 4 Sprites)

unique_effects.name: BoreusFrostSprite
unique_effects.description: After Surging, generate 2 Frost Sprites that grant your next attack +60 damage and minor frost damage (Max 4 Sprites)

unique_effects.name: CharrogSpentStaminaFireDamage
unique_effects.description:
After spending 150 stamina, next attack emits a cone of flame that deals +150 blaze damage to each
unique targets within the cone.

unique_effects.name: ChronovoreLegendaryAbility
unique_effects.description:
Legendary Ability: Rewind to your position 3 seconds prior to activation. Restores health and stamina lost
in that time, and removes debuffs. Become invulnerable and gain increased move speed for 6 seconds. Usable
while downed. Resets on Behemoth kill or after 90 seconds.

unique_effects.name: HeadDamage
unique_effects.description: 20% damage vs Behemoth Heads

unique_effects.name: HeadDamage
unique_effects.description: 30% damage vs Behemoth Heads

unique_effects.name: FifthHitStaggerDamage
unique_effects.description: The fourth hit in a row deals +50% stagger damage

unique_effects.name: FifthHitStaggerDamage
unique_effects.description: The fourth hit in a row deals +150% stagger damage

1.description: +7.5% Attack Speed for 16 seconds after dodging through an attack

2.description: +10% Attack Speed for 16 seconds after dodging through an attack

3.description: +12.5% Attack Speed for 16 seconds after dodging through an attack

4.description: +15% Attack Speed for 16 seconds after dodging through an attack

5.description: +17.5% Attack Speed for 16 seconds after dodging through an attack

6.description: +20% Attack Speed for 16 seconds after dodging through an attack

unique_effects.name: GnasherRage
unique_effects.description: Periodically enter a rage, dealing +10% damage and gaining immunity to stagger. Taking damage causes you to enrage more quickly.

unique_effects.name: BlazeDamageOnNthHit
unique_effects.description: The eighth hit in quick succession deals 75 bonus damage and major blaze damage

unique_effects.name: BlazeDamageOnNthHit
unique_effects.description: The eighth hit in quick succession deals 225 bonus damage and major blaze damage

unique_effects.name: KharabacBlades
unique_effects.description: Once charged, your next attack unleashes whirling blades that deal 25 terra damage. Additional attacks speed up the blades, which explode at the end of the duration and deal damage based on blade speed.

description: +200 Part Damage after dodging through an attack
+200 Part Damage after dodging through an attack
+400 Part Damage after dodging through an attack

unique_effects.name: NoAttackDamage
unique_effects.description: After not dealing damage for 4 seconds, the next 3 attacks deal 50% increased damage.

unique_effects.name: NoAttackDamage
unique_effects.description: After not dealing damage for 4 seconds, the next 5 attacks deal 50% increased damage.

description: After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Part Break Damage is increased by 50%
After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Part Break Damage is increased by 50%
After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Part Break Damage is increased by 100%

unique_effects.name: MalkarionLegendaryAbility
unique_effects.description: Legendary Ability: Teleport to a Behemoth, dealing Shock damage. Usable once, but resets on Behemoth kill.

unique_effects.name: StaggerHeal
unique_effects.description: Heal for 100 whenever a Behemoth is staggered.

unique_effects.name: StaggerHeal
unique_effects.description: Heal for 300 whenever a Behemoth is staggered.

description: After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Stagger is increased by 50%
After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Stagger is increased by 50%
After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Stagger is increased by 100%

unique_effects.name: HitTwice
unique_effects.description: 10% chance for attacks to Hit twice.

4.description: 5% critical strike chance, +10% critical strike damage.

5.description: 7.5% critical strike chance, +20% critical strike damage.

6.description: 10% critical strike chance, +30% critical strike damage.

unique_effects.name: DamageShadowOrbs
unique_effects.description: Dealing damage has a chance (based on damage dealt) to generate a shadow orb that increases damage dealt by 1.5% for 5 seconds. If 5 or more orbs are present, the bonus doubles.

unique_effects.name: DamageShadowOrbs
unique_effects.description: Dealing damage has a chance (based on damage dealt) to generate a shadow orb that increases damage dealt by 2.25% for 5 seconds. If 5 or more orbs are present, the bonus doubles.

1.description: When under 50% health, increase attack speed by 7.5%

2.description: When under 50% health, increase attack speed by 10%

3.description: When under 50% health, increase attack speed by 12.5%

4.description: When under 50% health, increase attack speed by 15%

5.description: When under 50% health, increase attack speed by 17.5%

6.description: When under 50% health, increase attack speed by 20%

unique_effects.description: After dodging, your next attack deals +50 bonus damage and part damage

unique_effects.name: DodgePartDamage
unique_effects.description: After dodging, your next attack deals +100 bonus damage and part damage

unique_effects.name: LowHpDamage
unique_effects.description: When under 20% health, deal +50% damage

5.description: 7.5% critical strike chance, +20% critical strike damage.

6.description: 10% critical strike chance, +30% critical strike damage.

unique_effects.description: Dealing damage has a chance (based on damage dealt) to grant a stacking, refreshing 20 health shield that lasts for 12s

unique_effects.description: After dodging though an attack, extend Mantra timeout by 1 seconds

unique_effects.description: After dodging though an attack, extend Mantra timeout by 3 seconds

unique_effects.name: ThraxLegendaryAbility
unique_effects.description: Legendary Ability: Deal umbral damage to nearby enemies and teleport high into the sky. Then choose a spot to slam down on to, dealing additional umbral damage. Usable once, but resets on Behemoth kill.

unique_effects.name: TorgadoroLegendaryAbility
unique_effects.description:
Legendary Ability: Enter a rage, gaining new attacks for 15 seconds. Deals +25% damage when the target is below
50% health. Usable once, but resets on Behemoth kill.

unique_effects.name: UrskaLegendaryAbility
unique_effects.description:
Legendary Ability: Create a Frost Shield that blocks hostile projectiles for 6 seconds. Damages and chills
Behemoths that contact it (can interrupt).

unique_effects.name: ValomyrCharge
unique_effects.description: Once charged, your next attack will deal 300 bonus radiant damage. Charge rate increases with current health.

unique_effects.name: ValomyrCharge
unique_effects.description: Once charged, your next attack will deal 550 bonus radiant damage. Charge rate increases with current health.

unique_effects.description: Using Pips generates 3 Frost Sprites that cause your next attack to deal 30 bonus damage and minor frost damage each. Max 4 Sprites.

Legendary Ability: Enter a rage, gaining new attacks for 15 seconds. Deals +25% damage when the target is below
50% health. Usable once, but resets on Behemoth kill.

unique_effects.description:
Legendary Ability: Create a Frost Shield that blocks hostile projectiles for 6 seconds. Damages and chills

After spending 200 stamina, next attack emits a cone of flame that deals +150 blaze damage to each

unique_effects.name: ChronovoreLegendaryAbility
unique_effects.description:
Legendary Ability: Rewind to your position 3 seconds prior to activation. Restores health and stamina lost
in that time, and removes debuffs. Become invulnerable and gain increased move speed for 6 seconds. Usable
while downed. Resets on Behemoth kill or after 90 seconds.
